org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers

Class QueryBond

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers.QueryChemObject
      • org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers.QueryBond
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, IBond, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IElectronContainer, IQueryBond
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CTFileQueryBond, OrderQueryBond, OrderQueryBondOrderOnly, SMARTSBond

    public abstract class QueryBond
extends QueryChemObject
implements IQueryBond
    Implements the concept of a "query bond" between two or more atoms. Query bonds can be used to capture types such as "Single or Double" or "Any".
    Created on:
    2010-12-16
    Belongs to CDK module:
    isomorphism
    Source code:
    master

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IBond

      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a multi-center query bond, with undefined order and no stereo information.

      QueryBond(IChemObjectBuilder builder)
      Constructs an empty query bond.

        atom2 - the second Atom in the query bond
        order - the query bond order
        stereo - a descriptor the stereochemical orientation of this query bond

      • getConnectedAtom

        public IAtom getConnectedAtom(IAtom atom)
        Returns the atom connected to the given atom.

        This method is only strictly relevant for 2-center query bonds since in multi-center query bonds, a given atom will be connected to multiple atoms.

        If called for a multi-center query bond, then the next atom in the atom list is returned. This is probably not what is expected and hence the user should instead call getConnectedAtoms(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom)

        Specified by:
        getConnectedAtom in interface IBond
        Parameters:
        atom - The atom the query bond partner is searched of
        Returns:
        the connected atom or null if the atom is not part of the query bond
        See Also:
        getConnectedAtoms(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom)

      • getConnectedAtoms

        public IAtom[] getConnectedAtoms(IAtom atom)
        Returns all the atoms in the query bond connected to the specified atom.

        Though this can be used for traditional 2-center query bonds, it is oriented towards multi-center query bonds, where a single atom is connected to multiple atoms.

        Specified by:
        getConnectedAtoms in interface IBond
        Parameters:
        atom - The atom whose partners are to be searched for
        Returns:
        An array of the connected atoms, null if the atom is not part of the query bond
        See Also:
        getConnectedAtom(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom)

      • isConnectedTo

        public boolean isConnectedTo(IBond bond)
        Checks whether a query bond is connected to another one. This can only be true if the query bonds have an Atom in common.
        Specified by:
        isConnectedTo in interface IBond
        Parameters:
        bond - bond The query bond which is checked to be connect with this one
        Returns:
        true if the query bonds share an atom, otherwise false
